root.name: The Sims 3: Supernatural
root.description: PC System RequirementsOperating Systems: XP SP2 / Vista SP1 / Windows 7CPU: For XP 2.0 GHz P4 processor or equivalent; For Windows Vista and Windows 7 2.4 GHz P4 processor or equivalentRAM: For XP 1 GB RAM / Windows Vista and Windows 7 1.5 GB RAM*DISC DRIVE: DVD driveHard Drive: At least 3.5 GB** of hard drive space with at least 1 GB additional space for custom content and saved games.Video: 128 MB Video Card with support for Pixel Shader 2.0Limited Edition (Plants VS. Zombies)Before the game was officially released, players had a chance to Pre-order The Sims 3 Supernatural to get the limited edition of the game. In the limited edition, you get a few new Plants Vs. Zombies clothing, items and activities. One item being the classic Pea Shooter, used to protect your house from Zombie invasions. You can command the Pea Shooter to shoot a Sim on your lot, play catch with it, or just let it do it's work automatically.
